<ProteomeCommons.org>
  <Project
    name="ProteomeCommons Java Analysis Framework"
    version="1.0">
    <Author id="jfalkner@umich.edu"/>
    <Description>An open-source framework for referencing common mass spectrometry data such as atoms and residues. This framework provides a programmer with an easy to use library for writing programs that rely on common mass spectrometry data.</Description>
    <Link type="Documentation" url="index.html"/>
    <Link type="Java API Documentation" url="docs/api/index.html"/>
    <Link type="Packaged API (JAR)" url="ProteomeCommons.org-JAF.jar"/>
  </Project>
</ProteomeCommons.org>
